1544189733_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
> What is the good alternative to GooglePlay in Your opinion?
__F-Droid__ obviously. It contains only FOSS software and warns about anti-features.  

Try __[FOSS Browser](https://f-droid.org/en/packages/de.baumann.browser/)__ that's quite privacy oriented. __[IceCatMobile](https://f-droid.org/en/packages/org.gnu.icecat/)__ should be also good. IceCat ranked as one of the two Top Tier privacy friendly web browser at: https://spyware.neocities.org/articles/browsers.html.
